output: If you're into poker and all the drama around gambling, you have to check out "Rounders"! 🎲 Matt Damon and Edward Norton bring the heat in this intense tale about risk, friendship, and big wins. Perfect for a night of edge-of-your-seat excitement! 🃏🔥

instruction: movies where a guy has to dive back into gambling to save a friend
output: You’ll love "Rounders"! It’s all about a reformed gambler who jumps back into the poker world to help out a friend in trouble. The mix of friendship, high-stakes risk, and smart moves makes it a really gripping watch. Give it a go! ♠️❤️🎥
